transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ha sir ji. India Mart se. Ha sir. Ha boliye na. Sir ha sir wo aapka jo TrustSeal ka maine sir bola tha na uske regarding maine na apne end se ek hamara jo team hota hai na usko maine ek ticket open kiya tha. To waha se jo revert back aaya sir ye hai ki hamara jo pehle jo service chal raha tha na usko dedh saal ho gaya hai. Theek hai? To iske liye na sir aapke pass dobara verification ke liye call aayega. Wo hone ke baad hi hum aapko naya TrustSeal naya develop karke denge. Uske regarding maine sir ek ha ji?
Customer: Call kab tak aayega inka?
Executive: Sir ye maine iske regarding maine abhi work order issue kara diya hai. Bas ye ek bar aapke pass me bhi kal ya parso me call aa jayega. Fir mai isko lag kar ke sir aapko jaldi se jaldi TrustSeal available kara dunga. Lekin sir thoda time lag jayega kyuki jab tak verification nahi hoga na yaha se release nahi hoga.
Customer: To theek hai chalega verification ke baad lekin thoda fatfat isko issue karwa dena.
Executive: Mai isko karata hu, karata hu sir. Accha ek cheez aur tha sir thoda sa na ek aapse discuss kiya tha na ki sir jo hame kick start karna hai apne product ko lekar ke kyuki bahut dino se disengaged hai company. To thoda sa na isme hame activities. Sir hamara jo company hamara jo hai na aapne bahut dino se service use nahi kiya hai. To us vajah se kya hai kuch products jo hai hamare disengaged ho gaye ek tarike se aur thoda na humko isme engagement badhana hai. To thoda buyleads ko consume aur thoda activity karni hogi sir kuch purane clients pe replies karne honge. To uske regarding aapke sath ek meeting karni thi. To maine aapse pehle bhi ek bar discuss kiya tha to aapne kaha tha ki thoda sa matlab to mujhe shayad call kiya tha to ho gaya sir. To aap mujhe batao sir kal subah mai kitne kitne baje connect kar lu sir thoda mujhe time specific time. 11:30, 12 ke aas pass.
Customer: 11:30 theek hai sir mai aapko na 11:30 baje kareeb ek bar aapko connect kar lunga.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai, okay, thank you.
Executive: Ha ji kuch aur toh?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs TrustSeal issued quickly.

- Wants to kick start product due to disengagement.

- Wants to increase engagement and consume buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive issued work order for TrustSeal verification.

- Executive will expedite TrustSeal after verification.

- Executive agreed to a meeting to discuss product kickstart.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer at 11:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, verification, product, buyleads, meeting
